content: this free pattern is my first published crochet design the let s beekind bag is a charming honeycomb-inspired tote designed to spread a little kindness with every stitch made with sturdy 3 mm cord and a large hook this bag works up quickly and makes a bold textured statement perfect for everyday use or gifting skill level beginner to intermediate this pattern is ideal for adventurous beginners looking to expand their skills and for intermediate crocheters who enjoy relaxing rhythmic stitching with clear instructions and minimal shaping it s a satisfying project for all levels features * crocheted base with a textured openwork body * button closure for added charm * sturdy strap for comfortable wear * uses bobbiny junior 3mm recycled cotton cord shown in mustard finished size approx 12 inches tall from base to strap start materials needed * approx 110 meters of 3 mm cord ~267g you will need 2 skeins of the bobbiny cord * 8mm crochet hook 1 large button * scissors tapestry needle gauge gauge is not critical but consistent gauge helps maintain shape * 8 stitches x 10 row = 4 x 4 in single_crochet using 8mm hook why you ll love it whether you re heading to the market gifting a handmade treasure or just want a stylish carryall the let s beekind bag is a sweet reminder to bee kind and look good doing it i did not have any testers for this pattern so i appreciate your feedback
